title: Castle of Ice

fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
$60
1 Guard: $100 + knock back to previous space
2 Guards: $400 + knock back to previous space
3 Guards: $700 + knock back to previous space

Snowman guards cost $5 per turn

fields.name: Drive-By:
fields.value: The wind is howling like this swirling storm inside. If you own a car (have some positive modifier to your dice roll), flip a coin. The road conditions are slippery, so if you get tails, you slide and crash into the next property tile and must pay double the property's rent to repair property damage (to the owner if it is owned, to the bank otherwise).
